meanings.sent1: The osteopath helped relieve my back pain.
meanings.sent2: I visited the osteopath for my joint issues.
meanings.sent3: Why did the osteopath bring a skeleton to the party? To bone up on social skills!
meanings.sent4: The osteopath's hands worked like magic, easing the tension in my muscles.
meanings.sent5: The osteopath's gentle touch made me feel better instantly.

meanings.definition: A person trained in osteopathic medicine.
meanings.sent1: My sister is studying to become an osteopath.
meanings.sent2: The osteopath explained the benefits of holistic healing.
meanings.sent3: Why did the osteopath become a comedian? To crack some funny bones!
meanings.sent4: The osteopath's knowledge of anatomy was impressive.
meanings.sent5: I trust the osteopath's expertise in treating my condition.

meanings.definition: A healthcare professional specializing in osteopathic medicine.
meanings.sent1: The osteopath at the clinic was very caring.
meanings.sent2: I prefer seeing an osteopath for my medical needs.
meanings.sent3: Why did the osteopath become a gardener? To help patients 'root' for their health!
meanings.sent4: The osteopath's clinic had a calming atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The osteopath's holistic approach to healthcare impressed me.
